text:
Replace numpy.in1d (Numpy 1.4) by the substitute code provided in
http://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy-1.4.x/reference/generated/numpy.in1d.html
this code is hard to understand. As I said in my mail, I would prefer to use np.logical_or and the two equality conditions, which is much easier to understand.

text: Sorry, I thought it was a recommandation more than an obligation. I have pushed the logical_or version (which is clearer, I agree !).

text:

contradicting me: people often do have better idaes than me.

That said, I am also a subborn old bastard :)
